<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mobile Magical Combat](/Feats.aspx?ID=2248) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 48</row>

**Archetype** [Spellmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=32)

**Prerequisites**
[Spellmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1134)

**Requirements**
You're wielding a melee weapon and have Cast a Spell requiring at least 1 action this turn.

</column>

---

You dart around the battlefield, casting spells while you carefully make melee attacks with your weapon. Stride once. If you end your movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, you can make a melee Strike against that enemy. You can use Mobile Magical Combat while [Burrowing](/Actions.aspx?ID=93), [Climbing](/Actions.aspx?ID=33), [Flying](/Actions.aspx?ID=94), or [Swimming](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.
